1. ëª¨ì˜ê³ ì‚¬ 3.6 - í…Œì¸íŠ¸(Taint) & í†¨ëŸ¬ë ˆì´ì…˜(Toleration) ì ìš©í•˜ê¸°

1. ë¬¸ì œ ìš”ê±´

Taint the worker nodeÂ node01Â to be Unschedulable. Once done, create a pod calledÂ dev-redis, imageÂ redis:alpine, to ensure workloads are not scheduled to this worker node. Finally, create a new pod calledÂ prod-redisÂ and image:Â redis:alpineÂ with toleration to be scheduled onÂ node01.

key:Â env_type, value:Â production, operator:Â EqualÂ and effect:Â NoSchedule

  • Key = env_type
  • Value = production
  • Effect = NoSchedule
  • pod â€˜dev-redisâ€™ (no tolerations) is not scheduled on node01?
  • Create a pod â€˜prod-redisâ€™ to run on node01
